text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki ai logon tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se tumhaare paas haq (quraan) aa chuka phir jo shakhs seedhee raah par chalega to vah sirph apane hee dam ke lie hidaayat ekhteyaar karega aur jo gumaraahee ekhteyaar karega vah to bhatak kar kuchh apana hee khoega aur main kuchh tumhaara zimmedaar to hoon nahin
